description: Create or update a Service Fabric service resource with the specified name.

cluster_name.description: The name of the cluster resource.

api_version.description: The version of the Service Fabric resource provider API. This is a required parameter and it's value must be '2019-03-01' for this specification.

application_name.description: The name of the application resource.

location.description: It will be deprecated in New API, resource location depends on the parent resource.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group.

service_name.description: The name of the service resource in the format of {applicationName}~{serviceName}.
